name: EncouragemeintheLord
0:
”Alexa, open encourage me”
”Alexa, start encourage me”
”Alexa, ask encourage me for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: encourage me
des: Ask Alexa to encourage you in the Lord. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer. I have ideas for future development if there is interest.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
